titles.title: To redesignate Rock Creek Park in the District of Columbia as Rock Creek National Park.
Rock Creek National Park Act of 2019
Rock Creek National Park Act of 2019
Rock Creek National Park Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Rock Creek National Park Act of 2019
This bill redesignates Rock Creek Park in the District of Columbia as Rock Creek National Park.
